üöÄ We're Hiring! | Test Lead üìç Location: Chennai / Hyderabadüïê Experience: 5‚Äì7 Yearsüíª Skills: Java, Test Automation, Test PlanningJob Description:Develop test cases and automation scripts for core applications and new features and ensure defect free release of the application. Review the customer requirements document the Test Plan detailing a systematic approach to testing including test scope, schedules, responsibilities, approach, reporting, etc. Also provide inputs on the effort estimation for testing. Co ordinate between onsite/offshore teams, customers, other support groups for smooth implementation of testing and to manage escalations as required. Review the development of test cases, test scripts and test data for functional and non functional testing. Ensure review defects are fixed and closed. Ensure the test execution is as per the planned execution dates, and quality of deliverables as planned. Escalate situations if required at appropriate times. Carry out sanity check on all core applications by running automated scripts and publish the results for integration tests. Analyse the test results by performing . root cause analysis and suggest necessary actions as required such as bug resolution, code optimization etc. Ensure test defects are tracked to closure. Review and regulate progress (schedule, cost, quality etc.) and meet performance objectives as per the project plans. Prepare and circulate important test metrics to stakeholders. Ensure supporting documents and knowledge base is created from testing results for further reference and that the defects are logged properly and test results are uploaded.If you're ready to put your knowledge and skills to work Immediate, send us your resume to ‚úâÔ∏èharikumar@lussotech.comDon't miss out on this incredible opportunity.hashtag#Hiring hashtag#TestLead hashtag#QA hashtag#Java hashtag#AutomationTesting hashtag#Chennai hashtag#Hyderabad hashtag#SoftwareTesting

Required Skills and Experience: Technical Expertise: - Strong proficiency in Python and Py test for automation testing. - Hands-on experience with Cucumber for BDD (Behaviour-Driven Development). - In-depth knowledge of Xray JIRA integration, including test case creation, execution, and reporting. - Experience designing and maintaining automation frameworks for scalable testing. - Defect management proficiency using JIRA or similar tools. - Knowledge of integrating test automation with CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab, or similar). - Expertise in Scrum ceremonies and execution.Connections matching this profile can reach me out here or at ramya.p@mapoutinc.comReferences are highly appreciatedThanks & RegardsRamya P Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist

Hi  Connections,Greetings of the day.Hope you all are doing well.We are hiring forREQUIREMENT:POSITION: QA Python Automation LOCATION: Noida EXP: 5-12 Years Mandatory Skills: Python, Py test, X-Ray Integration JOB DESCRIPTION: - Lead the design, development, and maintenance of robust automation frameworks using Python, Py test, and Cucumber. - Manage and execute end-to-end manual and automated testing for web and mobile applications. - Act as an Xray expert, ensuring seamless integration of Xray with JIRA for efficient test case management and reporting. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define test strategies and ensure comprehensive coverage. - Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines to ensure rapid and reliable deployments. - Identify, document, and track defects using tools like JIRA, ensuring timely resolution. - Monitor and analyse test results, providing actionable insights to improve product quality. - Train and mentor QA team members on automation best practices and tools. - Effectively communicate with US-based clients to convey test strategies, results, and quality improvements.  Required Skills and Experience: Technical Expertise: - Strong proficiency in Python and Py test for automation testing. - Hands-on experience with Cucumber for BDD (Behaviour-Driven Development). - In-depth knowledge of Xray JIRA integration, including test case creation, execution, and reporting. - Experience designing and maintaining automation frameworks for scalable testing. - Defect management proficiency using JIRA or similar tools. - Knowledge of integrating test automation with CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab, or similar). - Expertise in Scrum ceremonies and execution.Connections matching this profile can reach me out here or at ramya.p@mapoutinc.comReferences are highly appreciatedThanks & RegardsRamya P Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist

Hi  Connections,Greetings of the day.Hope you all are doing well.We are hiring forREQUIREMENT:POSITION: QA Python Automation LOCATION: Noida EXP: 5-12 Years Mandatory Skills: Python, Py test, X-Ray Integration JOB DESCRIPTION: - Lead the design, development, and maintenance of robust automation frameworks using Python, Py test, and Cucumber. - Manage and execute end-to-end manual and automated testing for web and mobile applications. - Act as an Xray expert, ensuring seamless integration of Xray with JIRA for efficient test case management and reporting. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define test strategies and ensure comprehensive coverage. - Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines to ensure rapid and reliable deployments. - Identify, document, and track defects using tools like JIRA, ensuring timely resolution. - Monitor and analyse test results, providing actionable insights to improve product quality. - Train and mentor QA team members on automation best practices and tools. - Effectively communicate with US-based clients to convey test strategies, results, and quality improvements.  Required Skills and Experience: Technical Expertise: - Strong proficiency in Python and Py test for automation testing. - Hands-on experience with Cucumber for BDD (Behaviour-Driven Development). - In-depth knowledge of Xray JIRA integration, including test case creation, execution, and reporting. - Experience designing and maintaining automation frameworks for scalable testing. - Defect management proficiency using JIRA or similar tools. - Knowledge of integrating test automation with CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab, or similar). - Expertise in Scrum ceremonies and execution.Connections matching this profile can reach me out here or at ramya.p@mapoutinc.comReferences are highly appreciatedThanks & RegardsRamya P Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist

Required Skills and Experience: Technical Expertise: - Strong proficiency in Python and Py test for automation testing. - Hands-on experience with Cucumber for BDD (Behaviour-Driven Development). - In-depth knowledge of Xray JIRA integration, including test case creation, execution, and reporting. - Experience designing and maintaining automation frameworks for scalable testing. - Defect management proficiency using JIRA or similar tools. - Knowledge of integrating test automation with CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab, or similar). - Expertise in Scrum ceremonies and execution.Connections matching this profile can reach me out here or at ramya.p@mapoutinc.comReferences are highly appreciatedThanks & RegardsRamya P Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist

Hi  Connections,Greetings of the day.Hope you all are doing well.We are hiring forREQUIREMENT:POSITION: QA Python Automation LOCATION: Noida EXP: 5-12 Years Mandatory Skills: Python, Py test, X-Ray Integration JOB DESCRIPTION: - Lead the design, development, and maintenance of robust automation frameworks using Python, Py test, and Cucumber. - Manage and execute end-to-end manual and automated testing for web and mobile applications. - Act as an Xray expert, ensuring seamless integration of Xray with JIRA for efficient test case management and reporting. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define test strategies and ensure comprehensive coverage. - Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines to ensure rapid and reliable deployments. - Identify, document, and track defects using tools like JIRA, ensuring timely resolution. - Monitor and analyse test results, providing actionable insights to improve product quality. - Train and mentor QA team members on automation best practices and tools. - Effectively communicate with US-based clients to convey test strategies, results, and quality improvements.  Required Skills and Experience: Technical Expertise: - Strong proficiency in Python and Py test for automation testing. - Hands-on experience with Cucumber for BDD (Behaviour-Driven Development). - In-depth knowledge of Xray JIRA integration, including test case creation, execution, and reporting. - Experience designing and maintaining automation frameworks for scalable testing. - Defect management proficiency using JIRA or similar tools. - Knowledge of integrating test automation with CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab, or similar). - Expertise in Scrum ceremonies and execution.Connections matching this profile can reach me out here or at ramya.p@mapoutinc.comReferences are highly appreciatedThanks & RegardsRamya P Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist
